analyzed_text: Hi,..I'm trying to make a "**Restful Web**" and I followed the documentation to do these End-Points:..- List Countries         - GET    /country.- Show Create Form     - GET   /country/create.- Create Country       - POST   /country.- Get Country            - GET    /country/:country_id.- Show Country Edit Form  - GET    /country/:country_id/edit.- Update Country       - PUT  /country/:country_id.- Delete Country       - DELETE /country/:country_id...But I can't make it right, here is my routes:....And here is my controller:....What I did wrong?..Thanks
